articles.title: 99 years of Indraprastha College for Women, 75 years of independence: What does education look like for the next century?
articles.description: To reduce education to a transactional exchange of knowledge acquired and economic value created is a ticking time-bombing of self-destruction. I would like people in positions of power to look at young India as more than a demographic dividend
articles.content:
One of the best naps I ever had was on a sunny winter morning in the back lawns of Indraprastha College for Women (IPCW), University of Delhi.

articles.title: US Tops Foreign Tourist Arrivals in India for 2022, But Bangladesh May Reclaim Top Spot This Year
articles.description: The US has emerged as the top contributor of foreign tourists to India for the second year running, with Bangladesh, the United Kingdom, Australia and Canada following respectively in the top five for 2022.
articles.content:
